SEARCH
Package peersim.kademlia

Class KademliaCommonConfig

java.lang.Object
peersim.kademlia.KademliaCommonConfig
public class KademliaCommonConfig extends Object
Fixed Parameters of a kademlia network. They have a default value and can be configured at startup of the network, once only.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Daniele Furlan, Maurizio Bonani
